name: Dragon Kings
description:
Dinosaurs and dragons have returned to earth to reclaim their throne. Battle the reptilian ancients from the past in this action roguelike shooter. Topple the most fearsome creatures to roam Earth and battle against the legends of Earth's fantasy mythology.

Features

  • 10 Weapon Drones
  • 50 Battle Skills
  • 6 different elements and combos
  • 10 unique and upgradeable super weapons

Unique quick customizable 20 minute runs
